changelog:
:loudspeaker: Changelog | Update qadr_ui v3.5

:gear: Refactor & Improvements:

- Moved and refactored craftingMenuCreator to a new shared/craftingmenu.lua file.
- Added support for multi-page crafting menus and improved data normalization.
- Updated examples.lua to demonstrate new multi-category crafting menu usage.
- Enhanced English locale with additional catalog translations.
- Minor stat comparison adjustment and debug print improvements in functions.lua.
- Enhanced fillet UI cleanup by clearing player stack and game settings bindings.
- Disabled native inventory system in configuration.

:pushpin: This update improves the crafting menu system and overall UI cleanup.

old.changelog:
:loudspeaker: Changelog | Update qadr_ui v3.5

:gear: Refactor & Improvements:

- Moved and refactored craftingMenuCreator to a new shared/craftingmenu.lua file.
- Added support for multi-page crafting menus and improved data normalization.
- Updated examples.lua to demonstrate new multi-category crafting menu usage.
- Enhanced English locale with additional catalog translations.
- Minor stat comparison adjustment and debug print improvements in functions.lua.
- Enhanced fillet UI cleanup by clearing player stack and game settings bindings.
- Disabled native inventory system in configuration.

:pushpin: This update improves the crafting menu system and overall UI cleanup.

:loudspeaker: Changelog | Update qadr_ui v3.3

:rocket: New Features:

- Introduced a new Lua file for role progression with functions to manage role cards, rank items, and kit items.
- Implemented a mergeDefaults function to initialize user data with default values.
- Added event watchers for role progression and season rewards, enhancing UI interaction.

:gear: Refactor & Improvements:

- Refactored the season rewards function to utilize the new event watcher structure.
- Improved code organization and readability.
- Removed obsolete event watching code from the season rewards function.
- Updated functions.lua with role progression functionality.

:pushpin: This update adds role progression system and enhances event handling.

:loudspeaker: Changelog | Update qadr_ui v3.0

:gear: Refactor & Improvements:

- Refactored bountyposter.lua to improve poster management logic.
- Removed redundant checks and cleaned up the removePoster function.
- Enhanced texture handling in createPoster function.
- Added missing translations.
- Updated functions.lua.

:pushpin: This update focuses on improving poster management and adding language support.

:loudspeaker: Changelog | Update qadr_ui v2.65

:gear: Refactor & Improvements:

- Refactored seasonpass.lua by removing unused variables and commented-out code to streamline functionality.
- Updated the structure for season rewards handling and improved data processing logic.
- Updated fxmanifest.lua to include new poster-related exports.
- Incremented version in verification.lua.
- Enhanced bountyposter.lua with new functions for poster management.
- Adjusted functions in seasonpass.lua and functions.lua for improved logic and cleanup.

:pushpin: This update improves season pass and bounty poster systems.

:loudspeaker: Changelog | Update qadr_ui v2.63

:gear: Refactor & Improvements:

Refactored seasonpass.lua:
- Removed unused variables and commented-out code.
- Updated the reward handling structure.
- Improved data processing logic.

:triangular_flag_on_post: File Structure Notice:

ðŸ”¥ Please delete your existing Qadr_UI folder and perform a clean install of the updated version.

:pushpin: This update focuses on backend improvements and prepares the script for future feature extensions.

:loudspeaker: Changelog | Update qadr_ui v2.62

:rocket: New Features:

Bounty Poster System (bountyposter.lua) improved.
Easily manage bounty posters directly in-game.

Journal System (journal.lua) improved.
Players can now track and interact with personalized journal entries.

Season Pass System (seasonpass.lua) added.
Manage season pass rewards and UI interactions seamlessly!

:sparkles: Enhancements:

Improved UI configuration (conf.lua) with detailed comments for clarity.
Added seasonrewards export to fxmanifest.lua.
Updated version number to 2.62 in verification.lua.

:wrench: Code Improvements:

Refactored server-side checks in functions.lua for cleaner execution.
Removed unnecessary debug print statements (functions.lua, journal.lua, seasonpass.lua).
Cleaned up commented-out debug code from eventhandler.lua.

:pushpin: Enjoy a cleaner, more performant, and user-friendly gaming experience!
